examples.example: 只有经历过困难，才会真正明白坚持的意义。

translate.english: Only by experiencing difficulties can one truly understand the meaning of perseverance.

examples.example: 只有用心去感受生活，才能真正体会到其中的美好。

translate.english: Only by feeling life with heart can one truly experience the beauty in it.

examples.example: 只有不断努力，我们才能真正实现自己的梦想。

translate.english: Only by continuous efforts can we truly realize our own dreams.
